oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman names for Stars. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-32. 8826 rev., 8842 and 8843, 8841 rev. and 8842 rev.). The stars (in Orion's belt) are named according to the hunting of springbok. 1) p.8841v: |han≠kass'o heard this from his mother (|xabbi-an), 2) pp.8841v & 8842v: the stars are named according to the hunting of springbok, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-32.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some of the stars (their names)
